refund_amount_valid.name: refund_amount_valid
refund_amount_valid.value:
"bookings"."amount_refunded" IS NULL OR 
          ("bookings"."amount_refunded" >= 0 AND 
           ("bookings"."total_price" IS NULL OR "bookings"."amount_refunded" <= "bookings"."total_price"))

refund_timestamp_logic.name: refund_timestamp_logic
refund_timestamp_logic.value:
("bookings"."amount_refunded" IS NULL OR "bookings"."amount_refunded" = 0) OR 
          "bookings"."refunded_at" IS NOT NULL
